creator: larry@theladders.com
text:
It looks like the Catalina:type=GlobalRequestProcessor,name=http-8080 mbean
attributes (including errorCount and requestCount) always return 0, even if
requests have been made....

This was working in 5.5.12...
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 38726 ***
creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
